rows.label: qev091701_MSG0001
rows.name: Heard any juicy tips, Yolanda? It's been a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0002
rows.name:
No get-rich-quick schemes like you'd want.
Just plain old, boring work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0003
rows.name: Eww, sounds awful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0004
rows.name: Yeah, it's dead here. We should have some fun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0005
rows.name: Like what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0006
rows.name: I'm tired of playing poker. Let's bring back the old game.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0007_m
rows.name: Ooo, I like it. And I've got the perfect player lined up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0007_f
rows.name: Ooo, I like it. And I've got the perfect player lined up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0008_m
rows.name: Nice! This one here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0008_f
rows.name: Nice! This one here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0009
rows.name: Yup.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev091701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what they're dragging you into.

rows.label: qev091701_JNK0020
rows.name: Resist

rows.label: qev091701_SEL0021
rows.name: Assert that you won't do anything illegal.

rows.label: qev091701_JNK0030
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: qev091701_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you'll do anything she wants and more.

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0010
rows.name: Easy, sweet thing. It's the perfect job for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, aren't we high and mighty?
Oh don't worry, we won't hurt anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0012
rows.name: Oh, I like the sound of that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0013
rows.name: I'll let Yolanda explain the rules.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0014
rows.name:
Basically, you take an insanely weak weapon
and use it to fight an insanely tough enemy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0015
rows.name:
Meanwhile, these chumps place bets
on whether or not you win.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0016
rows.name:
Gambling on life and death...
Sounds pretty exciting, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0017
rows.name:
And best of all, everyone can enjoy it without
risking their lives. ...Well, except maybe you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0018
rows.name: Enough chatter. Let's do this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0019
rows.name: Oh, wait. Hold on. First you need to draw a card.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0020
rows.name: That determines your target.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0021
rows.name:
Careful, pal. Some things in here
will kill you before you can say "boo."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_JNK0040
rows.name: Choose Left

rows.label: qev091701_SEL0041
rows.name: Pick the card on the left.

rows.label: qev091701_JNK0050
rows.name: Choose Middle

rows.label: qev091701_SEL0051
rows.name: Pick the card in the middle.

rows.label: qev091701_JNK0060
rows.name: Choose Right

rows.label: qev091701_SEL0061
rows.name: Pick the card on the right.

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0022
rows.name: The joker? Ooof.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0023
rows.name:
You're today's big winner, friend!
Your target is the worst of the worst.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0024
rows.name: We've had eight BLADEs attempt it. Followed by eight funerals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0025
rows.name: That is some bad luck right there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0026
rows.name: I'm sure all three cards were jokers, you dirty dog.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0027
rows.name: Dirty dog? You're one to talk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0028
rows.name: Anyway, we couldn't bet if there was zero chance of success.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0029
rows.name: This fight is totally winnable! ...Maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0030
rows.name: Oh, so you're betting on a win, then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0031
rows.name: Er...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0032_m
rows.name: Fine. Put me down for 100k on a win.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0032_f
rows.name: Fine. Put me down for 100k on a win.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0033
rows.name: And I'm going, too. Ninth time's the charm, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0034
rows.name: Seriously? That's not like you. Like, at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0035
rows.name: I'm just making money, same as usual.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0036
rows.name:
But this time, I get the added satisfaction
of taking it from the likes of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0037
rows.name: We'll see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0038
rows.name: And no cheating, Murderess. I mean it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0039
rows.name:
If you need to concede, come talk to me.
Until then, good luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091701_MSG0040
rows.name:
You do not sound like you mean that.
...Now let's go.[ST:wait ]
